title: Lord Over Your Lips, Part 2
description:
Imagine how much conflict we could avoid if everything we said came from a godly mind instead of our misguided emotions. Well, in this lesson, Dr. Tony Evans will explain why that goal is within your reach, and reveal how to make it a reality.

To support this ministry financially, visit: https://www.oneplace.com/donate/222/29
itunes:author: Dr. Tony Evans
